titleStmt.title: Directions to our arch-bishops and bishops, for the preserving of unity in the church, and the purity of the Christian faith, concerning the Holy Trinity
titleStmt.author: Shrewsbury, Charles Talbot, Duke of, 1660-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'ed ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Kensington the third day of February, 1695, in the seventh year of our reign. By His Majesties Command, Shrewsbury"--p. 7.
Item at reel 785:6 identified as Wing D1539 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.
